Transaction_State_Context.Withdrawal_State: When the owner calls withdraw to transfer all contract balance to their address.
Transaction_State_Context.Command_State: When the owner calls Command function to interact with other contracts by forwarding msg.value and data.
Transaction_State_Context.Multiplication_State: When any user calls multiplicate to attempt transferring contract balance plus the sent value.

External_Interactions.Withdraw_Interaction: Transfers contract balance to the owner upon withdraw function call.
External_Interactions.Command_Interaction: Allows the owner to call functions on other contracts with arbitrary data and value.
External_Interactions.Multiplicate_Interaction: Allows any user to attempt withdrawing funds from the contract based on contract balance conditions.
